1.title: Two Sum
1.description: Given an array of integers, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to a specific target.
1.input_format: First line contains the array, second line contains the target.
1.output_format: Return the indices of the two numbers.

2.title: Palindrome Checker
2.description: Check if a given string is a palindrome.
2.output_format: Return True if the string is a palindrome, else False.

4.title: Fibonacci Sequence
4.description: Generate the Fibonacci sequence up to n terms.
4.input_format: A single integer n representing the number of terms.
4.output_format: Return a list of Fibonacci numbers up to n terms.

5.title: Find Maximum in Array
5.description: Find the maximum value in an array of integers.
5.input_format: A single line containing space-separated integers.
5.output_format: Return the maximum integer in the array.

6.title: Check Prime Number
6.description: Check if a given number is a prime number.
6.output_format: Return True if the number is prime, else False.

7.title: Find GCD
7.description: Find the Greatest Common Divisor (GCD) of two integers.
7.output_format: Return the GCD of the two integers.

8.title: Binary Search
8.description: Given a sorted array of integers, find the index of a target value using binary search.
8.input_format: First line contains the sorted array, second line contains the target value.
8.output_format: Return the index of the target value. If the target is not found, return -1.

9.title: Merge Two Sorted Arrays
9.description: Given two sorted arrays, merge them into a single sorted array.
9.input_format: Two lines containing space-separated sorted arrays.

10.title: Factorial Calculation
10.description: Calculate the factorial of a given number.
10.output_format: Return the factorial of the given number.

11.title: Sum of Digits
11.description: Calculate the sum of digits of a given integer.
11.output_format: Return the sum of its digits.

12.title: Anagram Checker
12.description: Check if two strings are anagrams of each other.
12.output_format: Return True if the strings are anagrams, else False.

13.title: Find Second Largest
13.description: Find the second largest number in an array of integers.
13.input_format: A single line containing space-separated integers.
13.output_format: Return the second largest integer in the array.

14.title: Count Vowels
14.description: Count the number of vowels in a given string.
14.output_format: Return the number of vowels in the string.

15.title: Find Duplicates
15.description: Find the duplicate elements in an array of integers.
15.input_format: A single line containing space-separated integers.
15.output_format: Return the list of duplicate elements, if any.
